title: LibraryLoader: Try p/invoking to libdl.so.2 before libdl.so on Linux
body:
Newer Linux distributions (like Ubuntu 21.04) no longer ship with libdl.so, instead they have libdl.so.2
Try loading the newer lib first to fix issues like https://github.com/dotnet/maui/discussions/6385

Ideally we'd be using the [NativeLibrary.Load](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.runtime.interopservices.nativelibrary.load?view=net-6.0) API but we target netstandard2.0 here so we can't do that.
